#Normalising the data and applying PCA to reduce the no. of features before feeding it into SVM.
scaler_=StandardScaler()

X_test= X_test.loc[:, "Area": "ShapeFactor4"]

scaler_.fit(X_test)
scaled_X_test=scaler_.transform(X_test)

pca_=PCA(n_components=10, random_state=101)
pca_.fit(scaled_X_test)
pca_X_test = pca_.transform(scaled_X_test)
